channel.title: Recent Downtime
channel.description:
### Hi 0x00ers!
We're terribly sorry for the downtime we had :pray: There was an issue in our host that, including the limited IRL time available to spend on it, resulted in this 5-day blackout! (damn, I thought it was just 3)
Me and forum daddy @pry0cc finally fixed the logging issue that was causing docker to crash. Also, thanks to @messede for not letting me get sidetracked.
Sorry again, we'll be fixing this issue automatically from now on.
Aight, back to ~~banning~~ moderating again! ``` ▒█████ ▒██ ██▒ ▒█████ ▒█████ ██████ ▓█████ ▄████▄ ▒██▒ ██▒▒▒ █ █ ▒░▒██▒ ██▒▒██▒ ██▒▒██ ▒ ▓█ ▀ ▒██▀ ▀█ ▒██░ ██▒░░ █ ░▒██░ ██▒▒██░ ██▒░ ▓██▄ ▒███ ▒▓█ ▄ ▒██ ██░ ░ █ █ ▒ ▒██ ██░▒██ ██░ ▒ ██▒▒▓█ ▄ ▒▓▓▄ ▄██▒ ░ ████▓▒░▒██▒ ▒██▒░ ████▓▒░░ ████▓▒░▒██████▒▒░▒████▒▒ ▓███▀ ░ ░ ▒░▒░▒░ ▒▒ ░ ░▓ ░░ ▒░▒░▒░ ░ ▒░▒░▒░ ▒ ▒▓▒ ▒ ░░░ ▒░ ░░ ░▒ ▒ ░ ░ ▒ ▒░ ░░ ░▒ ░ ░ ▒ ▒░ ░ ▒ ▒░ ░ ░▒ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ▒ ░ ░ ░ ▒ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ▒ ░ ░ ░ ▒ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░░ ░ ░ ```

item.title: Recent Downtime
item.dc:creator: vict0ni
item.description:
Hi 0x00ers!

We’re terribly sorry for the downtime we had
There was an issue in our host that, including the limited IRL time available to spend on it, resulted in this 5-day blackout! (damn, I thought it was just 3)

Me and forum daddy @pry0cc finally fixed the logging issue that was causing docker to crash. Also, thanks to @messede for not letting me get sidetracked.

Sorry again, we’ll be fixing this issue automatically from now on.

Aight, back to banning moderating again!
